onboardingModal.declineConfirmText: Do you really want to decline the invitation to this course?

onboardingModal.congratulation: Congratulations, you are invited to participate in this course!
onboardingModal.formIntro: Please, update you current employment status:
onboardingModal.confirmSufficientTime: Finally, confirm your course participation only if you have the time to fully attend the course until the end.
onboardingModal.mattermostInfo1: After confirmation, please click directly on the button to go to the course chat.
onboardingModal.mattermostInfo2: If you don't have an account in our chat yet, you will need to sign up there first. The course chat is our central communication tool for the courses.
